packages.name: 六次方案
packages.scope: 釐清、行動實驗、回顧；含非同步追蹤。
packages.price_note: 實際費用視情況提供；可討論減免或公益名額。

packages.name: 單次會談
packages.scope: 聚焦單一主題；行動計畫＋簡短回饋。
packages.price_note: 適合特定決策或面試前準備。

policies.title: 改期
policies.body: 需 ≥24 小時前通知；否則視同使用。

policies.title: 不保證結果
policies.body: 我們共同設計實驗；結果受你的情境與行動影響。

checklist: 我每週能投入 60–90 分鐘反思或行動實驗。
我理解教練非治療／醫療建議。
我願意做小型測試並從結果學習。
what_to_prepare: 三個值得改善的工作情境
界線與限制（時間、精力、家庭）

process.title: How the process works
process.description: A three to four month container with 60-minute sessions and light touch check-ins between calls.

steps.title: Orientation & consent
steps.description: We map responsibilities, non-negotiables and what support looks like to you.

steps.title: Design paced experiments
steps.description: We test options, practise scripts and rehearse conversations you want to lead.

steps.title: Embed routines that protect energy
steps.description: We build tracking rituals so you can sustain momentum without overextending.

process.note: Optional asynchronous feedback through voice notes or docs helps you integrate between sessions.

sections.heading: 範疇
sections.body: 透過提問與實驗，支持釐清、決策與自我主導。

sections.heading: 非治療／醫療
sections.body: 不進行診斷或治療；必要時會建議尋求專業協助。

sections.heading: 保密與例外
sections.body: 會談內容保密，除非法律／安全需要揭露。

sections.heading: 同意與界線
sections.body: 任何時候都可暫停、拒絕或停止任何練習。

sections.heading: 改期與資料
sections.body: 24 小時改期；會談紀錄採極簡並妥善保存。

items.a: 預設線上視訊；倫敦可視情況安排實體。
先約 20 分鐘對談；沒有義務，一起判斷是否合適。

cases.title: Composite coaching glimpses
cases.description: Real situations blended from multiple returners so identities stay confidential.

items.title: Phased return while caregiving
items.context: After two years supporting elders, a marketing manager was invited back full time but worried about care logistics.
items.coaching_moves: We mapped non-negotiables, drafted boundary scripts and rehearsed a phased return proposal.
items.shift: They secured a 4-day transition plan with regular wellbeing check-ins agreed with their director.
items.disclaimer: Details blended from several clients to protect privacy.

items.title: Rebuilding confidence post-burnout
items.context: A programme lead returning after burnout leave felt anxious about pace and expectations.
items.coaching_moves: We designed a gentle energy audit, practised asking for support and set review rituals with their manager.
items.shift: They communicated capacity clearly and reported feeling grounded rather than bracing for collapse.

items.title: Translating new skills after study
items.context: A parent completed a certification during their break and needed to reposition for hybrid roles.
items.coaching_moves: We reframed experience stories, prototyped networking outreach and tested interview answers.
items.shift: They entered conversations confident about naming boundaries and new value.
